name: Create or update records in Ninox from a custom webhook
description: Streamline your data management process by integrating custom webhooks with Ninox. This template allows you to automatically create or update records in Ninox whenever a custom webhook is triggered. Say goodbye to manual data entry and ensure your records are always up-to-date, enhancing your workflow efficiency and accuracy. Perfect for users looking to automate their data handling and improve their operational processes.
